amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part A of House Report 117-420 as en bloc No. 4: Nos. 13 and 179.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc No. 4 comprised of amendments numbered 13 and 179, printed in Part A of House Report 117-420.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeLauro amendments (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 165 - 264 (Roll no. 370).

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A004) offered by Ms. DeLauro.
